title: Nova Scotia reports 14 new COVID-19 cases Monday, 36 recoveries - CTV News Atlantic
content:
HALIFAX -- 
Health officials in Nova Scotia are reporting 14 new cases of COVID-19 on Monday.
According to public health, 11 cases are in the province's Central zone.

author: Reuters
description: Tropical storm Bill is racing north-eastward and is expected to weaken later today, the U.S. National Hurricane Center (NHC) said in its latest advisory on Tuesday.
title: Tropical storm Bill expected to become extra tropical later on Tuesday: NHC - Reuters
content:
June 15 (Reuters) - Tropical storm Bill is racing north-eastward and is expected to weaken later today, the U.S. National Hurricane Center (NHC) said in its latest advisory on Tuesday.
